text: @SpeakerPelosi Coronavirus can spread though feces. YOU and @GavinNewsom and LA mayor have ALLOWED our homeless pop to grow. Your city hired ppl to clean up human feces on streets. YOU and every dem leader in CA allowed germs to spread on our streets. YOU DID NOTHING #VOTEREDinNOV #loonyNANCY
